name: Defaulter Stalker
description:
Defaulter Stalker is a game about find criminals among a bunch of innocent people.

The little robot gives you some tips to search these guys. Use vision scans to help you to find the guilty one.

A game made for Global Game Jam CWB 2021!

Controls: 

[ARROWS] - Move | [SPACE]- Shot | [CTRL] Change view

Credits:

Bruno Rollin - Programming, Art and SFX

Envato Elements - SFX
